ca.hullabaloo.util
Class QueryStringParser

java.lang.Object
  ca.hullabaloo.util.QueryStringParser

public class QueryStringParser
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains a very simple parseQueryString static method to parse the URL query strings.

Method Detail

parseQueryString

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parseQueryString(java.lang.String queryString)
parseQueryString is a simple URL query string parser. It does not handle multiple parameters with the same name

Parameters:
queryString -
Returns:
Map with the parameter names and their values
